name: AVMediaSelectionOption
desc: An object that represents a specific option for the presentation of media within a group of options.

items.name: var mediaType: AVMediaType
items.desc: The media type of the media data.

items.name: var mediaSubTypes: [NSNumber]
items.desc: The media sub-types of the media data associated with the option.

items.name: func hasMediaCharacteristic(AVMediaCharacteristic) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver has media with the given media characteristic.

items.name: var commonMetadata: [AVMetadataItem]
items.desc: An array of metadata items for each common metadata key for which a value is available.

items.name: var availableMetadataFormats: [String]
items.desc: The metadata formats that contain metadata associated with the option.

items.name: func metadata(forFormat: String) -> [AVMetadataItem]
items.desc: Returns an array of metadata items—one for each metadata item in the container of a given format.

items.name: var isPlayable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the media selection option is playable.

items.name: var displayName: String
items.desc: A string suitable for display using the current system locale.

items.name: func displayName(with: Locale) -> String
items.desc: Returns a string suitable for display using the specified locale.

items.name: var locale: Locale?
items.desc: The locale for which the media option was authored.

items.name: var extendedLanguageTag: String?
items.desc: The IETF BCP 47 language tag associated with the option

items.name: func associatedMediaSelectionOption(in: AVMediaSelectionGroup) -> AVMediaSelectionOption?
items.desc: Returns a media selection option associated with the receiver in a given group.

items.name: func makeNowPlayingInfoLanguageOption() -> MPNowPlayingInfoLanguageOption?
items.desc: Creates a language option for a media selection option.

items.name: func propertyList() -> Any
items.desc: Returns a serializable property list that’s sufficient to identify the option within its group.
